EmailTemplate.name: LE-202205-HHS-ENT-SEVT-TRANSFORMATION-SUMMIT.on-demand-session
EmailTemplate.subject: Virtual Care Transformation - Insights from leading health systems
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN US Transformation Summit speaking session Virtual Care Transformation: Insights from Leading Health Systems
Tuesday, May 17 | 1 p.m. Central
Image Business meeting in conference room
The rise in virtual care has opened the door for transformational opportunities for hospitals and health systems. How can they elevate their virtual programs to become a core strategy going forward?
During this panel discussion, we’ll present exclusive new research findings and discuss key insights from our conversations with health system leaders as they create their transformational virtual care strategies.
See the agenda <[[https://www.modernhealthcareevents.com/event/63753f47-f815-4117-a1c5-a5c8dbd09d0b/websitePage:645d57e4-75eb-4769-b2c0-f201a0bfc6ce]]>
Hear from these industry leaders:
Anne Herleth Senior Director, Research The Health Management Academy
Bruce Brandes SVP, Health System Innovation Teladoc Health And be sure to visit our booth!
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
